New Records: The Padres tied a single-game MLB postseason record by hitting six home runs
Key Match Events: San Diego Padres hit six home runs in the game
Fernando Tatis Jr. hit two home runs
Jack Flaherty plunked Fernando Tatis Jr.
Fans threw baseballs into the field, leading to a 10-minute delay
